description: Skills library index for pattern discovery and reuse - Anthropic folder structure format
usage: Agent reads this to discover similar skills before creating new ones. Enables evolutionary skill development where new skills build on proven patterns from existing implementations.

migration_status.note: All skills migrated to folder structure. Flat files kept for 30-day backward compatibility period.

skills.name: get_adc_trials
skills.description: Get antibody-drug conjugate (ADC) clinical trials with pagination

skills.name: get_alzheimers_all_trials
skills.description: Get all Alzheimer's disease clinical trials across all phases and mechanisms

skills.name: get_alzheimers_fda_drugs
skills.description: Get FDA approved Alzheimer's disease drugs with deduplication and detailed information

skills.name: get_covid_antiviral_trials_recent
skills.description: Get recent COVID-19 antiviral clinical trials

skills.name: get_glp1_fda_drugs
skills.description: Get FDA approved GLP-1 drugs with deduplication (21 unique drugs)

skills.name: get_glp1_trials
skills.description: Get GLP-1 clinical trials with full pagination support (1803 trials across 2 pages)

skills.name: get_heart_failure_phase3_trials
skills.description: Get Phase 3 heart failure clinical trials

skills.name: get_kras_g12d_phase2_trials
skills.description: Get KRAS G12D Phase 2 clinical trials

skills.name: get_kras_inhibitor_fda_drugs
skills.description: Get FDA approved KRAS inhibitor drugs

skills.name: get_pd1_checkpoint_trials
skills.description: Get PD-1 checkpoint inhibitor clinical trials

pagination.description: Patterns for handling large datasets across multiple API pages

fda_queries.description: FDA drug database search patterns (JSON response)

ct_gov_searches.pagination: Use glp1-trials/scripts/get_glp1_trials.py as reference for pagination implementation
ct_gov_searches.status_filtering: Use uppercase format: RECRUITING, COMPLETED, etc.

fda_searches.deduplication: Use glp1-fda-drugs/scripts/get_glp1_fda_drugs.py as reference for drug deduplication

folder_structure.format: skill-name/ with SKILL.md and scripts/ subdirectory
folder_structure.discovery: Use discover_skills.py to find skills by pattern, server, or category

deprecation_notice.flat_files: All flat structure files (.py and .md at root) are deprecated as of 2025-11-19
deprecation_notice.action_required: Update imports to use folder structure: from .claude.skills.{folder}.scripts.{function} import {function}
deprecation_notice.backward_compatibility: Flat files kept during grace period for backward compatibility
